 Exception Reports

LM-Non Client Associated Exception Rpt  -  Exception report showing last month events that are not associated to a client record

TM-Non Client Associated Exception Rpt  -  Exception report showing this month events that are not associated to a client record

LM-Events on Non Prmr Clnt Exception Rpt  -  Exception report showing last month events associated to non Premier client records

TM-Events on Non Prmr Clnt Exception Rpt  -  Exception report showing this month events associated to non Premier client records

No Date Activity Complete Exception Rpt  -  Exception report showing events without Date Activity Complete Dates
